interactivity.requirements: You must be on at least Day  154  to unlock this Event. You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Supreme Overlord "
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplay during weekday if requirements are met

progression.synopsis: Sensei and some of his students help Tsuneyo move her things into her new dorm. She notices the bird which was there when Molly moved in , and suggests giving it a name â€” Noodles . When Sensei tells her that she needs some interests beside noodles, Tsuneyo gives a surprisingly direct response, but she doesn't actually know what it means. When Sensei refers to her words as a "curse", she drops her boxes, alarmed at having wished a calamity on him. The sudden crash upsets Miku , who tries to order Sensei to push-ups as punishment. Tsuneyo does them instead, lifting the "curse".

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.7.
